Text: If you want the English movie, forget it.  The only English track is the directors' commentary.  Which is worth it, but you don't get the movie in English.  All other tracks are the other languages.  FYI: It took an entire day of preproduction and then one of shooting to get the bookstore scene, and two dogs.
